tune.name: En marchant pour aller photocopier des trucs
tune.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
tune.composer-details:
I wrote this tune during Summer School 2019. It was an assignment given by Ian
Muir as part of the course for class musicians. The week was very busy and the
only time I found to compose the tune while I was on my way to the centre of
St. Andrews to go print music sets.
tune.content:
\transpose a, d {
  \relative g' <<
    {
      \clef treble
      \key a \major
      \time 6/8

      \repeat volta 2 {
        \partial 8 b8 |
        cis8 a a a a gis |
        fis d d d d cis |
        b d fis gis fis e |
        e fis gis a b cis |
        \break

        cis a a a a gis |
        fis d d d d cis |
        b d fis e gis b |
        a4. a4
      } \break

      gis8 |
      fis cis cis cis b cis |
      fis d d d cis d |
      e b b b a b |
      cis d e fis gis a |
      \break

      fis cis cis cis b cis |
      fis d d d cis d |
      e b b b a gis |
      fis4. fis4 fis8 |
      \bar "||" \break

      fis' cis cis cis b cis |
      fis d d d cis d |
      e b b b a b |
      cis d e fis4 d'8 |
      \break

      cis a a a a gis fis d d d d cis |
      b d fis e gis b |
      a4. a4
      \bar "|."
    }

    \new ChordNames {
      \chordmode {
        s8 |
        a2. | d | b:m | e:7 |
        a2. | d | b4.:m e:7 | a2. |

        fis2.:m/cis | d | e | cis4.:m fis:m |
        fis2.:m/cis | d | e | fis:m |

        fis2.:m/cis | d | e | cis4.:m d/fis |
        a2. | d | b4.:m e:7 | a4. s4
      }
    }
  >>
}
